title: Wine Bottle Holder Elephant
description: Elevate your wine collection and home decor with this luxurious, premium cold-cast polyresin wine bottle holder. Hand-painted and polished with care, this exquisite elephant face piece brings sophistication, charm, and a touch of exotic flair to your wine bar or dining space.

title: Dining chairs set, Scandinavian style
description: Modern, colorful, and comfortable – this 8-piece chair set by Egoonm brings Scandinavian design into your home. With their patchwork fabric, curved shape, and sturdy wooden legs, these chairs are real eye-catchers for your kitchen, dining room, or home office.

title: Fish Vase Dolomite
description: You can never have enough vases, and this one is truly a piece of art. The LIKE A FISH IN THE SEA ceramic vase is more than just a vessel—it’s a conversation starter. Crafted from dolomite and designed with an imaginative twist, the fish seems to glide effortlessly through the vase, creating a sense of motion and wonder. It immediately draws attention and may not even need flowers to shine.

title: Side cabinet made of reclaimed wood
description: Crafted by hand from solid reclaimed wood, this rustic side cabinet blends natural charm with practical storage. With three individually designed drawers and charming iron knobs, it brings vintage flair to any room — whether bedroom, hallway, or living area.Each cabinet is one of a kind, made from recycled teak, mango, acacia, or sal wood, showcasing unique grain, color, and history.

title: Timeless Traditions Tea Kettle
description: Add a touch of heritage to your tea rituals with the Timeless Traditions Hand-Painted Tea Kettle. Crafted from durable aluminium and adorned with intricate hand-painted designs, this kettle is where artistry meets function. Its vibrant patterns and classic charm make it more than just a kitchen tool—it’s a statement piece that adds warmth and culture to any setting.

title: Artisan Elegance Tea Kettle
description: The Artisan Elegance Hand-Painted Tea Kettle is a perfect fusion of tradition and craftsmanship. Its exquisite hand-painted design brings a sophisticated charm to your tea rituals, making it a standout piece in any setting. Crafted from durable aluminium, this kettle adds a touch of artistic beauty to every pour—whether for daily use or simply as a decorative accent.

title: Mosquito Killer Lamp
description: Enjoy peaceful nights with the Mosquito Killer Lamp, designed to eliminate mosquitoes efficiently without chemicals. Its dense 3D power grid uses physical electric shock to trap and kill mosquitoes safely and harmlessly—making it suitable even for infants and pregnant women.

title: Bolla Table Lamp short
description: The night light of the BOLLA series is a proposal for lighting to illuminate the room. Dedicated as a lamp for the living room, for the dresser and as a night lamp for the bedroom, guest room or children's room. When the main light in the room is turned off, the night light lights the room with a pleasant light.

title: Bolla Night Lamp long
description: Night light BOLLA long is a stylish lighting solution designed to softly illuminate your space in the evening hours. Whether placed in a bedroom, guest room, or children’s room, this lamp provides a pleasant and gentle glow once the main light is turned off. Its unique wooden base, with its sculptural form, serves as both a functional light source and an eye-catching decorative element.

title: Table Lamp Bleached Ship
description: Table lamp Bleached Ship is a charming LED night light designed to softly illuminate a child’s room before bedtime. When the main light is turned off, this decorative lamp with the playful Ship Beauty motif creates a cozy, calming atmosphere. The design, tailored especially for boys, features soft white tones and a cotton lampshade that fits beautifully into any child’s space.

title: Picnic Basket
description: If you love enjoying the outdoors and appreciate products that combine charm and practicality, the DKD Home Decor Picnic Basket is just what you need. Made from sturdy wicker in an attractive blue and white design, it includes accessories for up to four people, making it perfect for picnics in the garden, park, or on a hike. With approximate dimensions of 40 x 40 x 42 cm, this basket offers both style and convenience—at the best price.

title: Golden Pair - Decorative Figure
description: If you want to add a touch of originality to your home, the Decorative Figure DKD Home Decor in golden and white is just the piece for you. With its elegant design featuring a pair motif and its high-quality resin material, it brings both sophistication and personality to your space. Measuring approximately 21.5 x 10 x 28 cm, it combines style and presence in the perfect proportions.

title: Dutch Ceramic Vase
description: DUTCH VASE TIME – There is no such thing as too many vases! Vases are glamorous on their own and even more stunning in a group. Don’t hesitate to try it out and play with arrangements to find your favorite look.

title: Tiger Eye Wrap Bracelet
description: Embrace nature’s power and elegance with our Tiger Eye Wrap Bracelet. Each bracelet is crafted with genuine tiger’s eye stones, showcasing unique patterns and deep golden tones that effortlessly complement any outfit. This piece combines versatility with a timeless bohemian style, making it perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions. More than just jewelry, it is a symbol of confidence, strength, and refined sophistication. Let its natural beauty speak for you

title: Malachite Stone Bracelet
description: Stand out with our Malachite Stone Statement Bracelet. Crafted with genuine Malachite stones, each bracelet is a unique work of art, showcasing vibrant green hues and captivating natural patterns. The bold, bohemian design adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit, making it perfect for both casual gatherings and elegant occasions. Elevate your style with this distinctive charm and let it symbolize your individuality.

title: Leonomics Coffee Grinder
description: Brew fresh, flavorful coffee wherever you are with the Leonomics Manual Coffee Grinder. Its adjustable ceramic grinding system delivers consistent results while preserving aroma and taste. Built from durable stainless steel, it's compact, travel-ready, and easy to clean—perfect for home or on-the-go use

title: Reusable Coffee Capsules, 3pcs
description: A set of 3 reusable coffee capsules, perfect for enjoying a good cup of coffee without harming the environment since their use considerably reduces the waste that originates from conventional disposable capsules.

title: Red Italian Coffee Pot
description: If you’re looking for top-tier household appliances that combine style, performance, and value, look no further. The Italian Coffee Pot JATA Cafetera de inducción roja vulcano HCAF2009 in stunning red aluminium is the perfect addition to your kitchen. With its sleek design and powerful performance, this high-end coffee pot will enhance your daily coffee rituals.

title: Garden Chair Versa Mosaic
description: If you love taking care of every detail in your home and enjoy owning the latest products that make life easier, the Garden Chair Versa Mosaic Grey Metal is the perfect addition to your outdoor space. Designed with a timeless mosaic pattern and finished in an elegant grey, this garden chair blends style and comfort effortlessly. Crafted from durable metal with a sturdy metal frame, it offers both reliability and charm.

title: Portable Wine Table
description: A folding, portable wine table for outdoors, ideal for enjoying some relaxing time in the best company with a good wine. The ideal solution so you don’t have to leave the wine, glasses or snacks on the floor, thereby preventing bugs, spills, dirt, etc. This original lime plywood table is robust, lightweight, easy and convenient to fold and unfold for use or for saving space to make it easier to transport and store. It can be easily be carried and set up on the beach, in the countryside, mountains, garden, etc.

title: Tower Hydroponic Growing System
description: Bring the future of gardening right to your doorstep with this DIY Vertical Hydroponic Growing System! Perfect for fruit, vegetables, herbs, and leafy greens, this 5-hole soilless cultivation kit is designed for efficient, space-saving growing – no soil, no mess, just fresh produce all year round.

title: Lion Decorative Pillows
description: Decorative Pillows inspired by the magical atmosphere of the Jungle and Savannah. Each Set consists of 2 pillows 40 x 40 cm and stands out for its uniqueness and character. The Bertoni pillows stand out for their trendy design, durable print, combination of style simplicity and modern technology. Made of velor fabric, they are characterized by a high quality permanent digital print on the front and a monochrome back. Pillowcase closed with zipper and antiallergic padded insert. Machine washable repeatedly up to 40 °.

title: Barbecue Grill for Sausages
description: An original design barbecue grill for sausages which is ideal for enjoying delicious hot dogs, frankfurters, chorizo and other cured meats. This robust iron grill is non-stick so the food doesn't stick and is cooked more easily and efficiently. The ergonomic wooden handle is extra-long, which enables a more comfortable grip and avoids the danger of getting burnt during use. It features a safety ring which prevents the grill from opening while the food is cooking, providing a firm hold.

title: Italian Coffee Pot
description: Discover unbeatable prices on premium household appliances! Elevate your coffee experience with the Italian Coffee Pot Cecotec Cumbia Moking—a stylish, stainless steel coffee-maker designed for modern kitchens. Whether you prefer a smaller brew or a family-sized pot, choose from three convenient capacities:

title: Magazine holder "Wings"
description:
Floor magazine rack WINGS is a free-standing practical interior product that helps to hold magazines, newspapers, mail, periodicals, records at home, offices, and lounges. Made of powder-coated metal and oak wood.

designer: Barbora Adamonytė-Keidūnė

title: Poster "2 hot air balloons"
description: Our playful posters are made in Lithuania and framed by high quality wooden frames. Posters are designed to decorate the bedroom but also living room and bring coziness to the place. We created posters with some of the most beloved characters for kids but also suitable for adults.

title: Anti-Fatigue Floor
description: Upgrade your home with our premium anti-fatigue mat, designed to provide superior comfort and protection in your kitchen and living room. Crafted with high-quality PU material and a PE foam filling, this mat offers exceptional cushioning to reduce strain on your feet, knees, and back during long hours of standing.

title: Automatic Drip Watering System
description: An original and complete automatic drip watering system for plant pots that enables you to simultaneously water up to 8 plants conveniently and simply. In addition to saving water, time and effort, it takes the headache out of having to manually water plants yourself, which is a great help in carrying out this task more easily and safely, without forgetting or it becoming a burden, regularly, or while on holiday, etc.

title: Ceramic bud vase
description: Small ceramic bud vase for a single or few flowers. A flattened shape makes a simple vase more unique. Can be also used as an oil or vinegar dispenser.

title: Pineapple Lamp
description: Add a bold statement to your space with our Gold & Black Pineapple Table Lamp—a perfect blend of tropical charm and modern sophistication. Designed to stand out, this stunning lamp features a luxurious gold pineapple base, symbolizing warmth and hospitality, paired with a sleek black fabric shade for a touch of elegance.

title: Wall hook "DEER"
description: MULTIFUNCTIONAL USE. This universal coat hook can be mounted in the entryway, bathroom, kitchen, bedroom. Can be hanged coats, scarfs, clothes, keys, hats, towels, handbags, robes etc.
